programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: The Mystery Of Loch Ness: Giorgio Tsoukalos investigates whether sightings of the Loch Ness monster could be caused by a disturbance in the space-time continuum. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Curses: Do cursed objects really exist? This episode explores a painting in Britain that is said to start deadly house fires, a sinister doll in Florida and a curse-proof house.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind The Deal
programme.desc: Tripped Out Cash: Look back with the Golds as they recall the smartest and the stupidest deals that stick in the memory, plus those deals too difficult to resist. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The Mysteries of Alaska: The vast Alaskan wilderness is known for disappearances, stories of strange creatures and UFO sightings. Could this be due to an otherworldly presence? (S15, ep 8)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Aliens in Our Airspace: Eerie encounters at 40,000 feet, accounts of UFOs taking control of aircraft, and jumbo jets disappearing. Is this proof of aliens in our airspace? (S15, ep 9)

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S8, ep 15)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Karma is a Bid!: It's a scorcher in Banning, making Kenny dress for the occasion hoping to channel a Caribbean breeze. Rene is on the hunt for hot collectibles. (S13, ep 29)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Dusty We Trust: The blazing heat in Riverside inspires Lisa and Kenny to break out the parasols. Dusty wears his intuition on his sleeve and Ivy releases the hounds. (S13, ep 30)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The Hunch-Back of La Habra: The buyers try their luck at a new La Habra facility where Ivy teaches them a lesson. Meanwhile, Dusty brews himself up an interesting unit. (S14, ep 1)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The 300th Times the Charm!: Brandi and Lisa's friendship is tested as they go head-to-head on a pair of lockers. Kenny sets his fears aside and takes the plunge on a unit. (S14, ep 2)

programme.title: Mysteries From Above
programme.desc: Military Mysteries: Discover an array of mysterious phenomena seen from above, including a Nazi weapon in Northern France and a Russian military tower near Chernobyl. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Mysteries From Above
programme.desc: Submerged: A Turkish drought reveals a long-lost Basilica and its secrets, while the hull of a ship in the North Sea answers decades-old questions. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Mysteries From Above
programme.desc: Ancient Civilisations: Nubian pyramids reveal the rise of female power in Ancient Kush, while satellite images uncover secrets of an ancient Puebloan site in New Mexico. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Mysteries From Above
programme.desc: Unreachable Places: Discover strange markings in the remote region of Northern Finland and reveal secrets found deep in the Antarctic. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Mysteries From Above
programme.desc: Ghost Towns: Drones reveal what is left of Henry Ford's suburb in the Amazon, while clues to what killed a once-vibrant Pennsylvania mining town is discovered. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: Mysteries From Above
programme.desc: Desert Mysteries: Look down over a constant inferno in Turkmenistan, mysterious circles in the Namibian desert and secret electric blue ponds in Utah. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Mysteries From Above
programme.desc: Lost at Sea: Witness a remote island linked to one of the world's most famous aviation mysteries and explore thousands of shipwrecks in the Bermuda Triangle. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Ultimate Evidence
programme.desc: The Tesla Experiment. Giorgio A Tsoukalos draws on evidence from past series as he asks whether Nikola Tesla was communicating with extraterrestrials. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Ultimate Evidence
programme.desc: Alien Power Plants: Giorgio Tsoukalos draws on evidence from past series as he asks whether aliens introduced the Greeks and Egyptians to electricity. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Ultimate Evidence
programme.desc: The Mystery of Puma Punku. Experts in the extra-terrestrial examine the Inca ruin and its mysteriously intricate carved blocks. (S1, ep 5)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Ultimate Evidence
programme.desc: Alien Messages: Could some of our ancient texts and structures be home to secret messages left by alien ancestors? If so, what can we learn from them? (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Ultimate Evidence
programme.desc: Aliens And The Lost Ark: Experts on the extraterrestrial investigate the possibility of the religious relic being an alien artefact. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The Top Ten Alien Disasters: Explore the most devastating disasters ever documented that may have an otherworldly connection, from a flying monster to a deadly virus. (S16, ep 6)

programme.title: Banned From The Bible
programme.desc: Secrets of the Apostles: Ancient texts shed new light on the many competing Christian sects that sprang up in the first centuries after Christ's crucifixion. (Part 1 of 2)

programme.title: The Mystery Of The Holy Lance
programme.desc: Explore the fascinating 2,000-year-long history of the Holy Lance, a sacred relic of Christianity sought by Emperor Constantine, Napoleon Bonaparte and Adolf Hitler.

programme.title: Strange Evidence
programme.desc: A tunnel gains a terrifying reputation when hundreds of vehicles crash, seemingly without cause. Meanwhile, a strange creature is witnessed following a nuclear accident. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: Strange Evidence
programme.desc: Freak of the Deep: Deep-sea explorers discover a monster thousands of feet deep in the ocean, killer fog threatens a US town, and a truck spontaneously explodes on a freeway. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: Cops Who Kill
programme.desc: Steven Jones: Will Mellor and a team of experts delve into the case of Steven Jones, who tried to use his police knowledge to get away with the murder of his wife Madallin. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Cops Who Kill
programme.desc: Steven Jones: Will Mellor and a team of experts delve into the case of Steven Jones, who tried to use his police knowledge to get away with the murder of his wife Madallin. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Beyond Borders
programme.desc: A Salvadorian murder suspect is tracked down to the streets of New Jersey, while a Cuban businessman suspected of money laundering is apprehended in Tucson. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Dog Patrol
programme.desc: Corrections dog Wally makes a point of finding drugs on prison grounds, while Delta dog Hitch heads upstream in search of a violent offender. (S11, ep 5)

programme.title: Dog Patrol
programme.desc: In Wellington, patrol dog Quita puts the sting on a group of car thieves, while drug hunter Anika makes a stimulating discovery on the Customs mail belt. (S11, ep 6)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Bulletproof Gator: Series following life in the Gold family's pawn shop. The Golds clash when a man brings in an angry pet alligator he wants rid of. Will Les make a bad decision?

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Trouble Inside: Series following life in a huge Detroit pawn shop. One employee shocks the family by turning violent, and Ashley hits the roof when someone tries to sell her dirty knickers.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Series following life in a huge Detroit pawn shop. Staff fight over whether to buy a load of venomous reptiles, and an incident forces Les to seek a new head of security.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Series following life in a huge Detroit pawn shop. Les tells a frightening story of a stick-up at his grandpa's store, and a dominatrix brings her gear into the shop.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The Ninja And The Pitmaster: A stranger on a motorbike raises prices and eyebrows at in DeSoto. With just four lockers up for grabs, the bidding wars are fiercer than ever. (S4, ep 7)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Darth Victor: Jenny squares off against archrivals Ricky and Bubba in order to win her dream locker. Plus, one buyer discovers their dark side on the way to a big victory. (S4, ep 6)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Mayor Of Money Town: Victor gets more than he bargained for when he pursues a motorcycle in Carrollton. Ricky finds himself face to face with one of his biggest fears. (S4, ep 5)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Bronze Beauty: The auction action moves to the tiny town of Pantego, Texas, where one pair of buyers strikes gold with a curious wooden box. (S4, ep 4)

programme.title: Mysteries From Above
programme.desc: The Planet Unlocked: The Pyramids of Giza could be a map of the stars. First responders bring hope during Hurricane Katrina. An Indonesian volcano erupts in a shade of blue. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: Mysteries From Above
programme.desc: Out of Place: Discover strange aquatic mammals populating a river in Columbia, a ship marooned in sand along Namibia's Skeleton Coast and a Boeing 727 in a pine forest. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: Mysteries From Above
programme.desc: Disaster From Above: Malta loses a natural treasure, an enormous fiery vortex is seen in California and a mysterious radioactive hotspot is found near Chernobyl. (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: Mysteries From Above
programme.desc: Ocean Mysteries: Discover an underwater find from a violent past, a mysterious concrete 'ghost island' and never-before-seen tracks along the seabed. (S2, ep 4)

programme.title: Mysteries From Above
programme.desc: Behind the Myths: Reveal the truth behind ancient legends. Tour an island covered in polar bears, see bizarre twin craters and examine an ocean formation similar to Atlantis. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemmings Indigestion: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball. (S1 Ep50)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Sonata in Bear Major: Grizzy wants to get rid of the old piano in the garage at any cost, for the Lemmings love using it to make a racket. (S1 Ep51)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Fractions: The Lemmings find a crate from an army convoy transporting ultra-secret material that divides objects into multiple miniaturised versions of themselves. (S1 Ep52)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Bear that Laid Golden Eggs: Near the supermarket, a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket. (S1 Ep53)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Crash Training Course: Grizzy finds a gadget that enables you to learn anything. He can now become the perfect bear! But first, he needs to learn how to get rid of the Lemmings. (S1 Ep54)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: As Far as Bear Can Remember: An old metal box found by chance brings back childhood memories for Grizzy and the Lemmings. They recall the first time they met, when they were still kids. (S1 Ep55)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Chemical Lemmings: How can Grizzy watch a documentary on salmon fish, nice and comfy on the sofa, when the Lemmings are playing chemistry novices with a fun experiment box? (S1 Ep56)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Remote Control: Grizzy's TV remote control is stolen by a partridge who collects high-tech objects in his nest perched high up in a tree. (S1 Ep57)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.desc: A Dame-gerous Game: After Leshawna, Bridgette, Owen and Cody win a hide and seek contest, they're trapped on a private island by a jealous ex-champion and forced to play for their freedom. (S2 Ep14)

programme.desc: Mae'r merched dal yn erlid Pransky, yr arist graffiti, ac mae'r erlid yn eu harwain i'r goedwig. An attempt to catch a graffiti artist leads to a forest fire in the woods.

programme.title: PwySutPam?
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd ffeithiol hwyliog sy'n ateb y math o gwestiynau sydd gennych am y byd o'ch cwmpas. New factual light-hearted series which answers your questions about the world around you.

programme.title: Rhyfeddodau Chwilengoch
programme.desc: Animeiddiad am ferch cyffredin sy'n byw bywyd cyffredin - ond mae hefyd ganddi bwerau siwper-arwres! An ordinary girl, living an ordinary life - but she also has super powers!

programme.title: CIC
programme.desc: Gwers jiwdo gyda'r judoka Olympaidd Natalie Powell, Heledd a Lloyd yn cael tro ar gleddyfaeth, a chlwb martial arts Tremadog yw'r nesaf i daclo Sialens y Sgwad. This time: martial arts.

programme.title: Y 'Sgubor Flodau
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, bydd y tm yn creu rhywbeth arbennig ar gyfer gofalwyr ifanc yn yr YMCA yng Nghaerdydd. This time, the team create something special for the young carers at the YMCA in Cardiff. [SL]

programme.title: Dim Byd i Wisgo
programme.desc: Andria sy'n cael sylw Cadi ac Owain heddiw - actores o Abertawe sy'n chwilio am wisg addas ar gyfer mynd i theatr y West End yn Llundain. This time, we need an outfit fit for the West End! [SL]

programme.title: Codi Pac
programme.desc: Geraint Hardy sy'n 'Codi Pac' ac yn ymlwybro o gwmpas Cymru, a thref Y Bala sy'n serennu yr wythnos hon. This week Geraint Hardy discovers what Bala has to offer. [SL]

programme.title: Richard Holt: Yr Academi Felys
programme.desc: Wedi trip i'r acwariwm mae'r pobyddion yn pobi cacen morol er mwyn sicrhau lle yn y rownd nesa. After a trip to the aquarium, the bakers make sea-themed cakes in a bid to stay in the game. [SL]

programme.title: Sgorio: Caernarfon v Met Caerdydd
programme.desc: Gm fyw o'r Cymru Premier JD ar benwythnos olaf y tymor: Caernarfon v Met Caerdydd. C/G 12.45. Live JD Cymru Premier game on the season's final weekend: Caernarfon v Met Caerdydd. K/O 12.45.

programme.title: Gwladfa: Gwilym Bowen Rhys
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, daw taith Gwilym i'w therfyn gyda chyngerdd wrth droed mynyddoedd yr Andes. This time, Gwilym's visit to Patagonia comes to an end with a concert held at the foot of the Andes. [SL]

programme.title: Llond Bol o Sbaen: Chris yn Barcelona
programme.desc: Olaf y gyfres. Aiff Chris i Barcelona i ddarganfod diwylliant bwyd bywiog y ddinas, yng nghwmni Cerys Matthews. Tapas! Paella! Chris heads to Barcelona accompanied by Cerys Matthews. [SL]

programme.title: Cymru Wyllt Gudd
programme.desc: Ar hyd y dydd rhed y dwr, ac ry' ni am ei ddilyn o bennau'r mynyddoedd uchaf i'r dyfnderoedd Celtaidd. An epic journey following Wales' rivers, discovering wild secrets along the way. [SL]

programme.title: Clwb Rygbi: Dreigiau v Scarlets
programme.desc: Gm fyw Dydd y Farn Pencampwriaeth Rygbi Unedig rhwng y Dreigiau a'r Scarlets. Stadiwm Principality. K/O 17.30. Live Judgement Day United Rugby Championship - Dragons v Scarlets. K/O 17.30.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: Alun, Chris a Kiri yn Seland Newydd
programme.desc: Mae Chris Roberts, Kiri Pritchard McLean ac Alun Williams ar daith drwy Seland Newydd. Chef Chris Roberts, comedian Kiri Pritchard McLean, and presenter Alun Williams visit New Zealand.

programme.title: Bronwen Lewis: O'r Stafell Fyw
programme.desc: Cyfle i weld Bronwen yn llwyfannu ei thaith 'Yr Ystafell Fyw' ar lwyfan Canolfan y Celfyddydau Pontardawe. We see Bronwen staging her 'Living Room' tour onstage of Pontardawe Arts Centre.

programme.title: Curadur
programme.desc: Pennod o 'Tu Fewn i'r Felin' gyda'r cyflwynydd Rheinallt Sion ap Siencyn (Jenkins) wrth iddo ymweld Melin Melyn ym Melin. We visit the band Melin Melyn, and also hear from Bitw and Mwsog.

programme.title: Priodas Pum Mil
programme.desc: Abbey a Danial o Bwllheli yw'r pr hyfryd sy'n cael priodas am 5000 y tro ma! Abbey and Danial from Pwllheli are this week's lucky couple, and their friends and family are here to muck in.

programme.title: Y Tyrchwyr gyda Iolo Williams
programme.desc: Gyda'r tyllau yn llawn dop o rai bach, mae'n amser wynebu realiti bywyd tu allan. The burrows are overflowing with young. How do the animals cope with overcrowding and predation?

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod mawr i Bobo heddiw: diwrnod dysgu marchogaeth. It's a big day for Bobo today - learning to ride day!

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Heddiw ar Newffion Alaw gydag adroddiad ar agoriad swyddogol gardd synhwyrau Ysgol Llanilar. Today on Newffion Alaw reports on the official opening of Ysgol Llanilar's sensory garden.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Mae nifer o greaduriaid yn byw yn y pwll cerrig, ac mae gan Seren rwyd i'w gweld yn well! Lots of creatures live in the rockpool, and Seren has a net so she can see them better!

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Betsan yn mynd ar antur i Fferm Fach i weld sut mae moron yn cael eu tyfu gyda Hywel y ffermwr hud. Betsan goes on an adventure to Fferm Fach to learn more about how carrots are grown.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Huwcyn wedi adeiladu drysfa tylwyth teg rhyfeddol! When his friends get lost in the maze, will Huwcyn be able to guide them out again?

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Ceris yn holi 'Pam bod cathod yn mynd allan yn y nos?'. Mae ateb Tad-cu'n ddwl ac yn ddoniol. Today, Ceris asks Tad-cu 'Why do cats go out at night?'.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Mae Meleri a'r criw yn chwilio am micro-blastigau ar draeth Amroth ac ma criw o ddisgyblion Ysgol Penboyr wrthi'n garddio. Huw joins Nanw and Gwenno on their favourite Menai Strait walk.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Pam fod awyr Ocido wedi troi mor goch? Gyda chymorth Sim, Sam a Swn mae'r ffrindiau'n mynd ar daith yn y roced i gael yr ateb. Why has the sky in Ocido turned so red? The friends find out...

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu - i droi sbwriel yn sbeshal a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Ben Dant joins the pupils of Ysgol Dyffryn Trannon, Trefeglwys to create a superb treasure.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan aiff Dan i chwilio am Pigog yn y Coed Gwyllt heb ei sbectol ma'r gwencod yn chwarae tric arno ac mae'n syrthio mewn i ffos efo Pigog. The weasels play a nasty trick on Mole.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae hi'n amser gwely, ond mae Deian a Loli'n cael lot gormod o hwyl yn chwarae triciau yn lle. It's bedtime, but Deian and Loli are having way too much fun playing tricks instead.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Twrchelo yn beirniadu cystadleuaeth arlunio ac mae Dorti wedi penderfynu cystadlu gan ei bod yn hoff o beintio. Twrchelo judges an art competition and Dorti has decided to compete.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc !

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Os wyt ti'n dathlu dy ben-blwydd, dyma gyfle i ti weld dy lun ar Cyw. If you're celebrating your birthday, you may be lucky enough to see your photo on today's Cyw!

programme.title: Y Cosmos
programme.desc: Mae'r daith drwy'r Cosmos yn parhau, wrth i ni gyrraedd y Blaned Sadwrn. The ringed planet, Saturn, and exciting evidence which seems to suggest alien life here may have already been found.

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd. Mae Meinir a Sioned yng Ngorslas gyda Adam Jones, sy'n ymuno thm cyflwyno'r gyfres eleni. New series: Visiting the Kew Gardens Orchid Festival & native daffodils at Conwy.

programme.title: Priodas Pum Mil
programme.desc: Tro ma: cawn helpu teulu a ffrindiau Jack a Silvia o Lanfrothen, y ddau'n awyddus i gael priodas sy'n ofalgar i'r amgylchedd. We meet a couple who are keen to have an eco-friendly wedding.

programme.title: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Dathlwn Sul y Blodau gan ddysgu am draddodiadau Cymreig yr wyl. We celebrate Palm Sunday in Montgomeryshire; hymns from Capel y Tabernacl, Llanfyllin, and a performance by Siwan Henderson.

programme.title: Ty Ffit
programme.desc: Penwythnos olaf Dylan, Sharon, Arwel, Gwawr a Becky yn hafan ymlaciol Ty Ffit ac mae tasg olaf heriol o'u blaenau. It's the last weekend for the crew, and there's a challenging task ahead.

programme.title: Pen Llyn Harri Parri
programme.desc: Bydd Harri Parri'n darganfod rhai o straeon trafnidiaeth Pen Llyn. Harri Parri relives his travels in an old Austin Seven and roams Pen Llyn to discover the area's transport history.

programme.title: Pen Llyn Harri Parri
programme.desc: Bydd Harri yn olrhain hanes crefydd Pen Llyn sy'n llawn straeon lliwgar am bobl sydd wedi torri cwys eu hunain. Harri looks at the religious history of the Llyn Peninsula.

programme.title: Sopranos: Y Pasg
programme.desc: Elin Manahan Thomas sy'n canu ei hoff ganeuon crefyddol mewn rhaglen arbennig i ddathlu'r Pasg. Elin Manahan Thomas sings her favourite religious songs for this special Easter programme.

programme.title: Gwladfa: Gwilym Bowen Rhys
programme.desc: Fersiwn ffilm o'r rhaglen deithio lle mae'r cerddor Gwilym Bowen Rhys yn ymweld 'r Wladfa ym Mhatagonia. Film of the travelogue in which musician Gwilym Bowen Rhys travels to Patagonia.

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Cwrddwn ag Osian Morris, Dolgellau, dyn ei filltir sgwar sy' wrth ei fodd yn yr awyr agored. We meet Osian, who's hobbies include traditional stone-walling, beekeeping & playing the banjo.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Rhifyn omnibws yn edrych nl ar ddigwyddiadau yn Cwmderi dros yr wythnos ddiwethaf. Omnibus edition looking back at events in Cwmderi over the past week. With on-screen English subtitles.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: New: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Dathlu'r Pasg yn Llyn ac Eifionydd - canu o Gapel y Traeth, Cricieth a perfformiadau gan Mared Williams, Arfon Wyn & ensemble lleisiol Glanaethwy. We celebrate Easter in Llyn ac Eifionydd.

programme.title: New: Cynefin
programme.desc: Trip i'r Barri, un o'n cyrchfannau glan mr mwyaf poblogaidd gyda straeon a chyfrinachau annisgwyl yn cuddio yma. This time, Heledd, Iestyn & Llinos visit Barry town and surrounding area.

programme.title: New: Bariau
programme.desc: Ail gyfres. Mae cyflenwad newydd o gyffuriau yn achosi cur pen i Barry. Dyw dulliau rheoli Simon yn plesio neb. Second series. A new supply of drugs gives Barry a headache.

programme.title: Troseddau Cymru Gyda Sian Lloyd
programme.desc: Stori anghygoel Noel Jones, y dyn gafodd fai ar gam am ladd Janet Commins a hanes yr ymchwiliad aeth o le. The incredible story of Noel Jones, falsely accused of Janet Commins' mansalughter.

programme.title: 3 Lle: Sean Fletcher
programme.desc: Awn i Ysgol Widford Lodge, Penrhyn Gwyr a Llundain yng nghwmni Sean Fletcher o Good Morning Britain. TV presenter Sean Fletcher revisits Widford Lodge School, Tor Bay in the Gower & London.

programme.title: Welsh Whisperer: Ni'n Teithio Nawr
programme.desc: Pentref Llanrhaeadr, Sir Ddinbych sy'n cael y sylw yr wythnos hon, a dechreuwn gyda Phillip Williams, sy'n esbonio dryswch enw'r pentre! This week, a jolly trip to Llanrhaeadr, Denbighshire.

programme.title: The Real Ruth Ellis
programme.desc: A documentary looking at Ruth Ellis's turbulent life, her love affair with David Blakely, and the infamous crime that led to her being the last woman hanged in Britain. [SL]

programme.title: Unwind with ITV
programme.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

programme.title: Karen Carney's Leaders of the Pack
programme.desc: Laura Coombs: Karen travels to London Zoo to catch up with Manchester City's Laura Coombs - one of England's Lionesses - ahead of the 2023 FIFA Women's World Cup. [SL] S1 Ep5

programme.title: Karen Carney's Leaders of the Pack
programme.desc: Zecira Musovic: Karen catches up with Chelsea goalkeeper Zecira Musovic to talk through her achievements and learn how she is using her notability to help youngsters. [SL] S1 Ep6

programme.title: A Year in the Beacons
programme.desc: Documentary series. It's autumn in the Brecon Beacons as lord of the manor Harry is on a mission to pull in the punters with a clay pigeon shoot and farmers head to the hills. S1 Ep1

programme.title: Love Your Weekend with Alan Titchmarsh
programme.desc: On the farm with Alan this time are dancing legend Darcey Bussell, iconic broadcaster Johnny Ball, some very adorable rescue dogs and DIY pro Wayne Perrey.

programme.title: New: Jimmy and Shivi's Farmhouse Breakfast
programme.desc: Gladiator Nitro: Jimmy and Shivi welcome Harry Aikines-Aryeetey - also known as Nitro - to chat about his athletics career and the inside track on Gladiators. S2 Ep1

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world as well as the latest major sports results.

programme.title: New: James Martin's Saturday Morning

programme.title: Meet John Doe
programme.desc: 1941. Drama. Directed by Frank Capra. Stars Gary Cooper, Barbara Stanwyck & Edward Arnold. A drifter finds himself at the centre of a political movement after becoming part of a fraudulent story. [S]

programme.title: The Perfect Woman (1981)
programme.desc: 1978. Two dumb aliens are sent to earth to find an earthwoman suitable to be the wife of their leader. Stars Cameron Mitchell. [S]

programme.title: Lazybones
programme.desc: 1935. Comedy. Directed by Michael Powell. Stars Ian Hunter, Claire Luce & Bernard Nedell. Reg is expected to marry a wealthy American but she has been swindled and is penniless. [S]

programme.title: Time To Remember
programme.desc: A Sense of Values. 1964. Narrated by Niall MacGinnis. In 1937 Britain, soldiers rehearse for the Coronation but on the Continent, sandbags, air raid shelters and bombs presage things to come. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Down London River
programme.desc: 1962. A Look into a leisurely journey through London along the Thames.

programme.title: The Terror (1938)
programme.desc: 1938. Drama. Director: Richard Bird. Stars: Wilfrid Lawson, Richard Murdoch, Bernard Lee, Alastair Sims. No-one among the guests at Monk's Hall Priory suspects that The Terror is in their midst... [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed in the second half of April. [S]

programme.title: Black Saddle
programme.desc: 1959. The Penalty.Western with Peter Breck. After his brothers are killed in a shootout, a gunfighter decides to hang up his guns and uphold the law by becoming a lawyer.

programme.title: Space Patrol
programme.desc: The Forgers. 1963. Stars Murray Kash, Libby Morris & Ronnie Stevens. While investigating dying vegetation on Mars, Dart and Husky stumble across the source of forged currency. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: An Egg Grows in Gotham. 1966. Stars Adam West, Vincent Price & Edward Everett Horton. Egghead and his yeggs steal the Gotham City charter in a twisted plot to gain control of the city. [S]

programme.title: Richard the Lionheart
programme.desc: Crown in Danger. 1962. Stars Dermot Walsh, Peter Reynolds & Kevin Brennan. Three prisoners escape and take Sir Gilbert with them as hostage. Richard and his comrades set off to hunt them down. [S]

programme.title: Phantom Creeps
programme.desc: The Menacing Mist. 1939. Stars Bela Lugosi, Robert Kent & Dorothy Arnold. Dr Zorka's laboratory is raided by the Secret Service. [S]

programme.title: Mr Horatio Knibbles
programme.desc: 1970. Family comedy. Directed by Robert Hird. Stars Lesley Roach, Gary Smith & Rachel Brennock. Upset after not receiving a rabbit for her birthday, an imaginary rabbit friend appears for Mary. [S]

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: Goodbye Little John. 1960. Stars Richard Greene, Archie Duncan & Paul Eddington. Little John is concerned Will Scarlett has replaced him as Robin's lieutenant and he decides to leave the band. [S]

programme.title: Zontar - Thing From Venus
programme.desc: 1967. Sci-fi. Directed by Larry Buchanan. Stars John Agar, Susan Bjurman & Tony Huston. A young scientist believes an alien from Venus can help Earth but soon discovers it has a malevolent plan. [S]

programme.title: One Step Beyond
programme.desc: Premonition. 1959. Starring Pamela Lincoln, Paul Langton and Skip Young. A girl becomes haunted by a premonition of her own death, but will it come true... [S]

programme.title: Dick Barton: Special Agent
programme.desc: 1979. Writer: Clive Exton. Dick's Aunt (Stella Kemball) tells him that her house has vanished. Richard Marley reveals that Harold Jenkins (Peter Godfrey) has perfected his ultimate weapon.

programme.title: Fireball XL-5
programme.desc: Dangerous Cargo. 1963. Stars David Graham, Paul Maxwell & Sylvia Anderson. The team get permission to destroy a crumbling planet, unaware of the aliens that are waiting for them there.

programme.title: Captain Scarlet and the Mysterons
programme.desc: Seek and Destroy. 1968. Stars Jeremy Wilkin, Sylvia Anderson, Donald Gray. When the Mysterons threaten to kill one of the Angels, Scarlet and Blue are sent to Paris to ensure Destiny is kept safe.

programme.title: A Hill in Korea
programme.desc: 1956. War. Directed by Julian Amyes. Stars George Baker, Stanley Baker & Michael Caine in his first credited film role. In the Korean war, British soldiers try to fight their way back to safety. [S]

programme.title: Green For Danger
programme.desc: 1947. Thriller. Director: Sidney Gilliat. Stars Trevor Howard, Sally Gray & Rosamund John. Against a background of bombing raids, a series of murders take place in a hospital during WW2. [S]

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Fairground. 1976. Stars James Ellis, David Jackson, Sheila Fay, John Duttine & David Sterne. A young girl is attacked, and Lynch has to look into 'all the fun of the fair'. [S]

programme.title: A Family At War
programme.desc: The Night They Hit No.8. Created by John Finch. Stars Colin Douglas, Shelagh Fraser & Julie Goodyear. During a night of intense bombing the Ashton children are nowhere to be found. [S]

programme.title: Hombre
programme.desc: 1967. Western. Director: Martin Ritt. Stars Paul Newman, Richard Boone, Fredric March & Diane Cilento. People are not so welcoming when John returns to his home town to collect his inheritance. [S]

programme.title: Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde
programme.desc: 1980. Horror. Director: Alastair Reid. Stars David Hemmings, Lisa Harrow & Diana Dors. Dr Henry Jekyll experiments on his own personality, resulting in a terrifying struggle between good and evil. [S]

programme.title: Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde
programme.desc: 1980. Horror. Director: Alastair Reid. Stars David Hemmings, Lisa Harrow & Diana Dors. Dr Henry Jekyll experiments on his own personality, resulting in a terrifying struggle between good and evil. [S]

programme.title: The Blob
programme.desc: 1958. Sci fi. Directed by Irvin S. Yeaworth Jr. Stars Steve McQueen, Aneta Corsaut & Earl Rowe. Teenagers Steve and Jane attempt to save their town from a gelatinous creature from another planet. [S]

programme.title: Invasion of the Bee Girls
programme.desc: 1973. Sci-Fi Horror. Starring William Smith, Anitra Ford, Victoria Vetri. A cosmic force is turning earth girls into queen bees who 'love' their men to death.

programme.title: Randle & All That
programme.desc: Comedy short with Ernest Arnley, Gloria Day, Donovan and Frank Randle. Donovan and Byl perform comic acrobatics, Arnley and Gloria do a dance routine and Frank Randle plays an elderly shoe repairer.

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Appleby Fair and Private Rivers. 1980. A display of vintage farm machinery is found at the annual Appleby Fair. Jack Hargreaves goes fly-fishing on a Dorset chalk stream owned by Greg Lake. [S]

programme.title: Once A Sinner
programme.desc: 1950. Drama. A lowly bank clerk marries a good time girl but she two-times him for her old crooked boyfriend (Sydney Tafler). Starring Jack Watling, Pat Kirkwood and Thora Hird. [S]

programme.title: The Greed of William Hart
programme.desc: 1948. Horror. Directed by Oswald Mitchell and screenplay by John Gilling. Set in Edinburgh in the 1800s and starring Tod Slaughter as William Hart the infamous body broker. [S]

programme.title: Master Spy
programme.desc: 1964. Drama. Directed By Montgomery Tully. Starring Stephen Murray. A Russian scientist working for the British is suspected of being a 'plant', sent to monitor nuclear secrets for the Communists. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Pygmalion and Elly. 1962. Stars Irene Ryan, Louis Nye & Donna Douglas. Sonny decides he needs to change Elly into a woman of society, while Granny uses love charms to heat up their relationship. [S]

programme.title: Stagecoach
programme.desc: 1966. Western. Directed by Gordon Douglas. Stars Van Heflin, Stefanie Powers & Bing Crosby. On the stagecoach to Cheyenne, a group of passengers must work together to survive the arduous journey. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: An Egg Grows in Gotham. 1966. Stars Adam West, Vincent Price & Edward Everett Horton. Egghead and his yeggs steal the Gotham City charter in a twisted plot to gain control of the city. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life On the Scent

programme.title: Alice in Wonderland
programme.desc: 1966. Fantasy. Directed by Jonathan Miller. Stars Anne-Marie Mallik, Peter Sellers & Wilfrid Brambell. Young girl Alice falls down a rabbit hole into a bizarre world full of eccentric characters. [S]

programme.title: Where Strangers Meet
programme.desc: 1951. A magnificent travelogue about Soho, featuring the streets, businesses and people you would find in this area of London in the 1950s.

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Debt. 1960. Stars Richard Greene & Brian Rawlinson. A foreigner poses as one of Robin's outlaws and robs several people. When Robin learns the man's identity he realises he owes him a debt. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Appleby Fair/Ramming Time. 1986. The annual Romany horse fair in the Eden Valley and a sheep farm in the South Downs are the subjects of two more films from Jack's country diary. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: We watch the lost films from the Ovaltine factory's heyday, and we have a special guest with some rare items. The Easter Bunny is here! And we have a reel of England's 'rebirth' after the war. [S]

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: The Sign of Four

programme.title: Gideon's Way

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: The Call of the Feather: Jean-Claude dreams of having a cowboy hat like his friend Billy. But it's not easy to find a hat that's the right size for an earthworm! (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Wild Wild Thunderfoot: When the Tinhorns trap Thunderfoot through dumb luck, the Dino Ranchers need to set the wild spinosaurus free before the Tinhorns get themselves in real trouble. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Lost Dinosaur: When Min spots a rare dinosaur in a hidden forest, she's over the moon. When the Dino Ranchers and Tinhorns go to look for it, they realise it's important to respect nature. (S1 Ep25)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: The Dino Doldrums: When the Ranch dinos come down with an illness, Blitz tries to hide that he's also getting sick, until his symptoms strike at the worst possible time! (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Goliath's Little Helper: Clover learns that even though he's not strong enough yet to be a barn builder like his grandpa, his job on the Ranch is just as important (S1 Ep27)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Have You Herd?: When a quirky little stego finds more joy acting like a compy, Jon and Blitz have a hard time try-ing to get him to fit in with the stegosaurs. (S1 Ep28)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Storm-A-Lert: In the middle of an approaching storm, Miguel rushes through his important jobs so he can work on his new invention. (S1 Ep47)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Adoptasaurus Rex: Ma and Pa inspire the Ranchers to fight through adversity and give an egg to a pair of T-Rexes who can't have their own. (S1 Ep48)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: Clover Takes Over: When Clover's overconfidence jeopardises a medical air mission, the bronto learns to ask for help. (S2 Ep47)

programme.title: Dino Ranch
programme.desc: You're More Than Your Roar: When Biscuit gets a case of roaringitis and some egg-stealing Raptors invade the Ranch, Biscuit goes to ridiculous lengths to restore his roar. (S2 Ep48)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Try, Try Again: A van with monkeys invites everyone to test themselves with the help of an attraction - a power meter. The Bear is confident that he will easily win the main prize. (S5 Ep20)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Perfect Robot: Molang and Piu Piu order a robot that does everything, but don't realise it's doing too much... (S5 Ep39)

programme.title: Mary Millington: Confessions...
programme.desc: ...from the David Galaxy Affair. A playboy astrologer has to prove his alibi for a years-old robbery. With Mary Millington, Rosemary England and Diana Dors. Contains sexual scenes.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Deadly Sins
programme.desc: Bawdy seventies sketch comedy film starring a bevy of British talent from Bruce Forsyth and Harry Secombe to Joan Simms and June Whitfield. Contains 70s social attitudes.

programme.title: Right To Roam
programme.desc: The story of the people who have struggled for the right to roam in England - from the mass trespass on Kinder Scout in 1932 to the great Dartmoor Gathering of 2023.
